name: Yvy
description:
Explore the tale of creation of the world according to the Guarani Mbya. A people that still persist strong and proud despite the current attempts by the brazillian government to take away native lands, for exploration and profit, the oppresion these people suffer, and despite that, still show their resolve and willingness to fight for their way of life.

Based on the book "A Terra uma só" from Timóteo Verá Tupã Popygua. Yvy is a journey across the memory of the Guarani Mbya, in an attempt to help preserve these millenial tales.

Use Arrow Keys to move. Mouse Button to interact.
